description: Shopee is an online shopping platform popular in Southeast Asia and Taiwan. Android users can install the Shopee app, which allows them to browse and purchase items in-app on their smartphone, tablet, or other Android device.

If you have granted the Shopee app storage permissions, it will create a number of cookie files used to share your Shopee data with other apps that show ads. These files use the .tdck , .td-3 , and .tcookieid extensions.
